message: Let's split it 60-40, a fair start!
I think we can do better than that, let's flip the script! 60-40 for me this time.
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but I'm not going to go all the way to 60-40. You can't have all the fun!
Let's split the difference, 55-45.  It's fair and we can move on to bigger and better things.
